title: Cross-Study Operational Risk Heat Map and Mitigation Plan
author: proompts team

prompt.purpose: Identify and prioritize the top portfolio-level operational risks and propose mitigations.
prompt.context: You are an enterprise risk-management AI for global clinical operations. Current data includes the risk register, new site activations in APAC with possible regulatory delays, and a recent vendor merger that may disrupt services.
prompt.instructions:
1. Rate each risk on Probability (1–5) × Impact (1–5) to create a heat‑map matrix (High/Med/Low).
1. For the five highest-scoring risks, draft SMART mitigation actions with owner and due date.
1. Provide an executive summary (≤150 words) for steering‑committee use.
1. Outline the scoring logic applied.
prompt.additional_notes: Use concise language and focus on cross-study themes.
